name: Lakitu's Great Adventure 2
summary: A year after the events of Lakitu’s Great Adventure, Nidoking awakens, fiercer, stronger and more evil than ever. He begins to spread terror throughout the world because he wants to conquer it, but to do so, he must defeat Lakitu once and for all, ordering his soldiers, old and new, to find Lakitu and kill him. As soon as the news arrives, Lakitu is immediately alarmed and will venture into this new world, full of never-before-seen biomes, containing 12 long levels. It is up to Lakitu, along with Yoshi, to stop Nidoking, this time forever! This hack contains 12 long and not too easy levels.
